amendment.description: To allow a refundable tax credit for the energy costs of farmers and ranchers, and to modify the foreign tax credit rules applicable to dual capacity taxpayers.

action.text: Amendment SA 2629 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2629 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 345.

Amendment SA 2629 proposed by Senator Dayton. (consideration: CR S13132-13133; text: CR S13132-13133) To allow a refundable tax credit for the energy costs of farmers and ranchers, and to modify the foreign tax credit rules applicable to dual capacity taxpayers.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2629 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 345.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2629 proposed by Senator Dayton.
